markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Living Boulder](/Monsters.aspx?ID=650)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Living boulders roll and glide through the Plane of Earth, gathering gemstones and metal shards until their surfaces resemble a ship's hull covered in barnacles. Barely more intelligent than many animals, living boulders fill much the same role on the Plane of Earth as the great herd animals found on Material Plane worlds.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Living Boulder](/Monsters.aspx?ID=650)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=57" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 108 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +6; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [tremorsense 30 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** -1

**Con** +4

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +5 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 36

**Immunities**
bleed, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, burrow 20 feet; earth glide

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +10,
**Damage** 1d8+6 piercing

**Earth Glide**   A living boulder can [Burrow](/Actions.aspx?ID=93) through earthen matter, including rock. When it does so, it moves at its full burrow Speed, leaving no tunnels or signs of its passing.

**Rolling Charge** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The living boulder Strides twice, and can then make a Strike with its jaws. This jaws Strike gains [Knockdown](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=20).

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-42" />
name: Living Boulder

Barely more intelligent than many animals, living boulders fill much the same role on the Plane of Earth as the great herd animals found on Material Plane worlds.
